game_statuses.description: Fully developed and ready to play
Ranked games with leaderboard and STEEM rewards

games.title: Rainbow Rush
games.description: Rush through colorful levels in this fast-paced arcade game!
games.author: Cur8 Games

games.title: Blocky Road
games.description: Navigate through a procedurally generated world filled with vehicles, floating platforms, and trains. Collect coins and avoid obstacles in this addictive infinite runner!
games.author: Cur8 Games

status.description: Ranked games with leaderboard and STEEM rewards

games.title: Tower Defense 3D
games.description: Un emozionante gioco tower defense 3D! Costruisci torri strategiche per difendere la tua base dalle ondate di nemici. Migliora le torri, sblocca abilit√† speciali e sopravvivi alle ondate infinite. Gioco completamente integrato con Platform SDK per tracking punteggi e progressi.
games.author: Ggameplatform

games.title: Seven
games.description: Elegant and engaging dice game with stylish 3D visuals. Bet on 7 or under, roll the dice, and test your luck in a smooth and immersive experience designed for all devices.
games.author: Cur8 Games

games.title: Merge Tower Defense
games.description: Elite Defense Force! Merge identical turrets to create powerful towers and defend against endless zombie waves. Strategic tower placement meets addictive merge mechanics in this mobile-optimized tower defense game.
games.author: Cur8 Games

games.title: Yatzi 3D
games.description: Classic dice game with 3D physics. Roll five dice and score combinations to beat the opponent!
games.author: Cur8 Games

games.title: Briscola
games.description: The classic Italian card game! Play against the AI with 3 difficulty levels, challenge a friend locally, or play online in multiplayer.
games.author: Cur8 Games

games.title: Sky Tower
games.description: Build the highest tower you can! Stack blocks perfectly to reach the sky. Perfect alignment keeps blocks full size and earns combo bonuses.
games.author: Cur8 Games

status.description: Ranked games with leaderboard and STEEM rewards

games.title: Roll A Ball
games.description: A hypnotic and relaxing game where you create bouncing balls! Tap the screen to generate new balls, collect coins, and unlock amazing upgrades. Increase gravity, bounce, size, and much more. Enjoy spectacular animations with rainbow effects and explosive particles.
games.author: Cur8 Games

games.title: Space Shooter
games.description: Vertical space shooter where you pilot a spaceship through waves of enemies, dodging bullets, collecting power-ups, and pushing for the highest score in fast-paced arcade action.
games.author: Cur8 Games

status.description: Ranked games with leaderboard and STEEM rewards

games.title: Survivor Arena
games.description: Survive waves of enemies in a seamless toroidal arena! Collect weapons, level up, and face increasingly difficult hordes. How long can you survive?
games.author: Cur8 Games

status.description: Ranked games with leaderboard and STEEM rewards
